t: Amazon is opening a hair salon in London to trial new technology | The Verge
s: April 20, 2021 - Amazon is opening a concept salon in London. Amazon Salon will be used to trial new technology, including AR assistant apps for haircuts. Don’t expect Amazon to make a move on your local hairdresser, though, this seems like more of a marketing stunt than anything else.
